message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. I'm hoping for a quick and amicable agreement!
Alice, your offer was a bit harsh.  Let's be reasonable - I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Okay, let's try a more balanced split. I'll take 55, you take 45.  Let's find some common ground.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more. My turn to propose 55/45.
